esef-14233_2021.value: The core activities of the Group include providing ﬁnancing to  and carrying out a wide range of ﬁnancial activities with  companies, both at home and abroad, belonging to the entire  Würth Group, as well as providing consulting and other  services in the area of pension funds and insurance to both  private persons and small and medium-sized enterprises.
